TGFOData.disbursementsTreemapAggregation: $apply=<filterString>groupby((ComponentName,GeographicAreaCode_ISO3,GeographicAreaName,MultiCountryName),aggregate(TotalDisbursedAmount with sum as disbursed, TotalSignedAmount with sum as signed, TotalCommittedAmount with sum as committed, GrantAgreementId with countdistinct as count))
TGFOData.locationDisbursementsTreemapAggregation: $apply=<filterString>groupby((ComponentName,GeographicAreaCode_ISO3,GeographicAreaName,MultiCountryName,GrantAgreementTitle,GrantAgreementNumber),aggregate(TotalDisbursedAmount with sum as disbursed, TotalSignedAmount with sum as signed, TotalCommittedAmount with sum as committed, GrantAgreementId with countdistinct as count))
TGFOData.disbursementsTreemapDrilldownAggregation: $apply=<filterString>groupby((GeographicAreaCode_ISO3,GeographicAreaName,MultiCountryName,ComponentName),aggregate(TotalDisbursedAmount with sum as disbursed, TotalSignedAmount with sum as signed, TotalCommittedAmount with sum as committed, GrantAgreementId with countdistinct as count))
